member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Interactive.VsInteractiveWindowPackage`1.Microsoft#VisualStudio#Shell#Interop#IVsToolWindowFactory#CreateToolWindow(System.Guid@,System.UInt32)
member.summary: When a VSPackage supports multi-instance tool windows, each window uses the same rguidPersistenceSlot. The dwToolWindowId parameter is used to differentiate between the various instances of the tool window.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Interactive.CommonVsUtils.GetActiveTextView
member.summary: Gets the current IWpfTextView that is the active document.
Gets the properties of the currently selected projects necessary for reset.

member.summary: Return namespaces that can be resolved in the latest interactive compilation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Interactive.ScriptingOleCommandTarget
member.summary: This command target routes commands in interactive window, .csx files and also interactive commands in .cs files.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Interactive.VsUpdateSolutionEvents
member.summary: Allows us to watch solution events so we can track the build when we run the "ResetInteractiveFromProject".
